content.heroIntro: Welcome to AM HOME NAUFRAGOS, a stunning new residential development by AM HOME located in the sought-after Playa Los Naufragos area of Torrevieja, Alicante. This exclusive project offers modern 1-bedroom apartments starting from just €168,000, making it an exceptional value proposition for buyers seeking quality coastal living in Spain's largest expat community. Scheduled for completion on 01-03-2026, AM HOME NAUFRAGOS combines contemporary design with practical living spaces, perfect for investors, retirees, and families looking for the Mediterranean lifestyle. The development features premium amenities including a communal swimming pool, air conditioning pre-installation, and fitted kitchens with modern appliances. With English widely spoken throughout the region and excellent healthcare facilities including the 24-hour Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja, AM HOME NAUFRAGOS offers security and convenience for international buyers. The location provides easy access to pristine beaches like Playa del Cura (Blue Flag) and nearby golf courses including Villamartín, just 15 minutes away. Whether you're seeking a holiday retreat, investment property with strong rental potential (€650 per week), or permanent residence, AM HOME NAUFRAGOS presents a compelling opportunity in one of Europe's most popular coastal destinations.

locationSection.intro: Playa Los Naufragos is a vibrant coastal destination in Torrevieja that perfectly balances relaxation with convenience. This charming beachfront area is known for its golden sandy beaches, crystal-clear Mediterranean waters, and welcoming community atmosphere. Torrevieja itself has become Spain's premier expat destination, with the largest international community in the country where English is widely spoken everywhere. The area combines authentic Spanish coastal living with modern amenities and international services. Playa Los Naufragos benefits from excellent connectivity to Alicante Airport (just 30 minutes away), making it perfect for those who need regular international travel. The neighborhood offers easy access to world-class healthcare, international schools, shopping centers, and an array of restaurants and bars. Its proximity to championship golf courses, including Villamartín just 15 minutes away, makes it ideal for golf enthusiasts. The warm Mediterranean climate ensures year-round sunshine and outdoor living, while the established expat community provides support networks and cultural familiarity for international residents.
